data.title: ukuran
data.meta_description: UKURAN translate: magnitude, measure, measure, measurement, measurement, format, scale, size, size. Learn more in the Cambridge Indonesian-English Dictionary.
data.text:
noun

magnitude [noun] size

measure [noun] a unit

measure [noun] a system of measuring

measurement [noun] size, amount etc found by measuring

measurement [noun] the sizes of various parts of the body, usually the distance round the chest, waist and hips

format [noun] shape and size, eg that of a book, magazine etc.

scale [noun] a set of regularly spaced marks made on something (eg a thermometer or a ruler) for use as a measure; a system of numbers, measurement etc

size [noun] largeness

size [noun] one of a number of classes in which shoes, dresses etc are grouped according to measurements

(Translation of ukuran from the PASSWORD Indonesian–English Dictionary © 2015 K Dictionaries Ltd)
